inclusion.criterion: Either monoinfected with HCV or coinfected with HCV and HIV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Will to have samples stored for future research
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must have a referring physician or clinic that will continue to provide medical care.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Positive ELISA and western blot test for HIV, and Positive serology and/or positive HCV RNA test
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Have any other condition, which the investigator considers a contraindication to study participation.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of liver failure on liver biopsy, abdominal ultrasound, or liver function blood tests
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Receiving HCV therapy at the time of enrollment
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and the recent coinfection with HBV. His past medical history is non-significant.
